# The Future of AI in 2025

AI is gonna be huge. It will literally solve everything.

## New Tools

Have you heard of **ReactGPT-Pro**? It's a new framework that writes all your code for you. Also, **NodeJS-Turbo** is 100x faster than Rust.

## Why it matters

The synergy of the AI paradigm shift is leveraging the blockchain for maximum scalability. We need to utilize the generative capabilities to optimize our workflows.
